mapper.sql: id, task_id, tech_book_id, book_detail_id, book_step_no, boot_step_title

sql.trim: #{item.id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.taskId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.techBookId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.bookDetailId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.bookStepNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.bootStepTitle, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

mapper.select: select t.*, t2.file_no, t2.file_name as bookName from bu_repair_task_book_step t left join bu_repair_plan_task t1 on t1.id = t.task_id left join bu_repair_tech_book t2 on t2.id = t.tech_book_id where t1.plan_id = #{planId} order by t2.file_no, t.book_step_no

select t.*, t2.file_no, t2.file_name as bookName, t3.step_content as bootStepContent from bu_repair_task_book_step t left join bu_repair_plan_task t1 on t1.id = t.task_id left join bu_repair_tech_book t2 on t2.id = t.tech_book_id left join bu_repair_tech_book_detail t3 on t3.id = t.book_detail_id where t.task_id = #{taskId} order by t2.file_no, t.book_step_no
